## üìù How to use Real-Time Comments

üßæ Navigate to the dot where you want to add or view comments.

üñäÔ∏è Type your message in the comment box and press Enter to post it instantly.

üëÄ Any teammate's response will appear immediately, allowing smooth back-and-forth communication.

üìå Use @username to notify someone directly and draw attention to specific details.

üíæ Comments remain attached to the dot for future reference and ongoing discussion.


::div{class="flex w-full justify-center max-w-5xl mx-auto h-120 py-4"}
:video{src="/real_time.mp4" class="rounded-md object-cover w-full h-full" controls autoplay muted loop}
::

### üí° Tips

* Leave short, clear comments right where your feedback is needed.

* Add emoji reactions (üëç ‚ù§Ô∏è üòÑ) to make your replies more fun and expressive.

* Combine comments with annotations or highlights to give more precise context.

* Use @mentions to notify the right people and avoid communication delays.
